verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Make me an instrument, an instrument of worship
I lilt up my hands in Your Name.
Make me an instrument, an instrument of Worship
I lift up my hands in Your Name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tune me Your instrument ,
Your instrument of worship.
I lift up my hands in Your Name.
Tune me Your instrument,
Your instrument of worship.
I lift up my hands in Your Name

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Play me Your instrument,
Your instrument of worship.
I lift up my hands in Your Name
Play me Your instrument,
Your instrument of worship.
I lift up my hands in Your Name
